Sentencas: Tm-2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x = 0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) solid electrolytes have been investigated as potential electrolyte materials for solid oxygen fuel cells (SOFCs), operating in the medium temperature range (600-700 & DEG;C).
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The design of new oxygen-conducting materials is of importance for their possible utilization in the solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The oxygen-ion conductivity of the Tm-2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x = 0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) stuffed pyrochlores ceramics was investigated by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (two-probe AC) in dry and wet air.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The synthesis of precursors via co-precipitation and the precipitate decomposition temperature have been shown to be of key importance for obtaining dense and highly conductive ceramics.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: At similar to 770 & DEG;C, the highest total conductivity, similar to 3.16 x 10(-3) S/cm, is offered by Tm2Ti2O7.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The conductivity of the fluorite-like solid solution Tm-2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x = 0.74) is an order of magnitude lower.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: However, for the first time a proton contribution of similar to 5 x 10(-5) S/cm at 600 & DEG;C has been found in Tm-2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x = 0.74) fluorite.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: Until now, compositions with proton conductivity were not known for the intermediate and heavy rare earth titanates Ln(2)(Ti(2-x)Ln(x))O7-x/2
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores
Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The use of X-ray diffraction (structural analysis with Rietveld refinement), optical spectroscopy and dielectric permittivity data allowed us to follow structural disordering in the solid solution series with increasing thulium oxide content.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: High and low cooling rates have been shown to have different effects on the properties of the ceramics.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: Slow cooling initiates' growth of fluorite nanodomains in a pyrochlore matrix.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: The fabrication of such nanostructured dense composites is a promising direction in the synthesis of highly conductive solid electrolytes for SOFCs.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores

Sentencas: We assume that high-temperature firing of nanophase precursors helps to obtain lightly doped stuffed pyrochlores, which also provide the high oxygen-ion conductivity.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conductivity, Dielectric Properties and Spectroscopic Characterization of Stuffed Tm2(Ti2-xTmx)O7-x/2 (x=0, 0.1, 0.18, 0.28, 0.74) Pyrochlores
